effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
short_effect.platinum: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.platinum: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
